meanings.sent1: She kept misdividing the cake into unequal slices.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned the students about misdividing fractions in math class.
meanings.sent3: The chef's misdividing of the ingredients turned the soup into a strange concoction.
meanings.sent4: His habit of misdividing his time between work and play led to unbalanced days.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misdividing the responsibilities among the team members were evident in the project's failure.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misdividing of the land caused property disputes among the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the misdividing of the sections in the report and corrected it.
meanings.sent3: The misdividing of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The misdividing of the budget resulted in financial chaos for the company.
meanings.sent5: His constant misdividing of tasks among the team members created confusion and inefficiency.
